00011 struct VolumeStruct     //pretty uncreative name, but it's all I can come up with atm
00012 {
00013         int                     Volume;         //Between 0 and 16384, lowest bit is forced to 1, default is 0
00014         DWORD           unknown_4;      //uninitialized
00015         int                     unknown_int_8;  //Volume * 1024, default is unknown_int_1C * 1024
00016         int                     unknown_int_C;  //default is 1073741
00017         int                     unknown_int_10; //default is 1000
00018         int                     unknown_int_14; //default is 0
00019         DWORD           unknown_18;             //default is ds:87E848h
00020         int                     unknown_int_1C; //default is 16384
00021 };

00023 class VocClass

00027         static VocClass* Find(const char* pName)
00028         {
00029                 for(int i = 0; i < Array->Count; ++i) {
00030                         if(!_strcmpi(Array->Items[i]->Name, pName)) {
00031                                 return Array->Items[i];
00032                         }
00033                 }
00034                 return NULL;
00035         }
00036 /* dunno what gives, but this doesn't work, the one below does
00037         static int FindIndexOf(const char* pName)
00038         {
00039                 for(int i = 0; i < Array->get_Count(); i++)
00040                         if(!_strcmpi((*Array)[i]->get_Name(),pName))return i;

00047         /* Play a sound independant of the position.
00048            n = Index of VocClass in Array to be played
00049            Volume = 0.0f to 1.0f
00050            Panning = 0x0000 (left) to 0x4000 (right) (0x2000 is center)

00053                 JMP_STD(0x750920);
